sentences.en: " There it is, just around the curve. "
sentences.cn: “ 到了, 就在弯过去的地方. ”

sentences.en: A silver curve of the moon hovered already in the western sky.
sentences.cn: 一弯银月已经悬在西天.

sentences.en: A smile curved her lips.
sentences.cn: 她笑了，嘴唇弯成一道弧线。

sentences.en: a sweeping curve of railroad track
sentences.cn: 铁轨的大弧线

sentences.en: Both he and the crew are on a steep learning curve.
sentences.cn: 他和组员们都学得很快。

sentences.en: Each firm will face a downward-sloping demand curve.
sentences.cn: 每一家企业都将面临需求曲线的下滑。

sentences.en: Her eyes were dry and there was dignity in every curve.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛是干的,但充满了庄严的神色.

sentences.en: The car negotiated the sharp curve by slowing down.
sentences.cn: 该车减速驶过急转弯.

sentences.en: The car took the curve much too quickly.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

sentences.en: The curve illustrates costs per capita.
sentences.cn: 这条曲线显示人均费用。

sentences.en: the delicate curve of her ear
sentences.cn: 她耳朵的优美曲线

sentences.en: The engine of the train left the rails at a curve.
sentences.cn: 火车头在拐弯处脱轨.

sentences.en: The path of an arrow is a curve.
sentences.cn: 箭的轨迹是一条曲线.

sentences.en: The population curve has slowed down.
sentences.cn: 人口曲线已趋平缓.

sentences.en: The slope increases as you go up the curve.
sentences.cn: 上了弯道以后，路越来越陡。

sentences.en: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.cn: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

sentences.en: The train slowed its speed as it went around the curve.
sentences.cn: 火车在弯道行驶时放慢了速度.

sentences.en: The train turned in a curve.
sentences.cn: 火车沿弯道转弯.

sentences.en: This is an inward curve.
sentences.cn: 这是一条向里弯曲的曲线.

sentences.en: Was it just a temporary blip on an otherwise healthy growth curve?
sentences.cn: 这是否是原本良好的增长曲线中暂时的偏离？

words.tran_cn: 使弯曲；弯成弧形（curve的ing形式）
[数]曲线；弯曲；曲线球；曲线图表

phrases.tran_cn: 菲利普斯曲线；菲利普曲线
响应曲线；频率曲线；灵敏度特性曲线
过渡曲线，介曲线；缓和曲线；转变曲线

trans.tran_en: a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this
